visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins set to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The title and axes labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to improve readability. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, while the y-axis title indicates the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly average temperature data. The series color is set to a custom color (#FF6347). Additionally, the legend is enabled and styled with a consistent font size and color. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
